name: $cooldown
description: Implements a cooldown period for commands

args.name: id
args.description: Unique identifier for the cooldown, applicable to any entity

args.name: duration
args.description: The length of the cooldown period

args.name: code
args.description: The code to execute during the cooldown period

name: $dbVersion
description: Returns the current version of ForgeDB

name: $deleteCooldown
description: Removes the cooldown for a specified identifier

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier for which to remove the cooldown

name: $deleteVar
description: Deletes a value from a specified variable

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the variable from which to delete the value

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the value to be deleted (e.g., user, guild, channel, message)

name: $getCooldownTime
description: Retrieves the remaining cooldown time in milliseconds for a specified identifier

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier for which to retrieve the cooldown time

name: $getDB
description: Returns all stored identifiers in the database

name: $getLeaderboardValue
description: Fetches the position of a value in the leaderboard for a specified variable

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the variable whose leaderboard position is to be retrieved

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the value (e.g., user, guild, channel, message)

args.name: sort type
args.description: The sort order for the leaderboard, either ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

name: $getVar
description: Retrieves the value of a specified identifier in a variable

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the variable to retrieve the value from

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the value (e.g., user, guild, channel, message)

args.name: default
args.description: The default value if the identifier does not exist in the variable

name: $leaderboard
description: Generates a leaderboard for specified identifiers in a variable

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the variable to create the leaderboard for

args.name: envValue
args.description: Variable name for $env to retrieve the id and value with $env[<name>;id] and $env[<name>;value] respectively

args.name: envPosition
args.description: Variable name for $env to retrieve the position with $env[<name>]

args.name: code
args.description: Code to execute for each row; use $return to return results

args.name: sort type
args.description: The sort order for the leaderboard, either ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

args.name: max
args.description: The maximum number of rows per page

args.name: page
args.description: The page number to display

args.name: separator
args.description: The separator to use between rows

name: $setVar
description: Assigns a value to a specified identifier in a variable

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the variable to set the value in

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier for the value (e.g., user, guild, channel, message)

args.name: value
args.description: The value to be assigned
